first_para: Alex Attwood MLA (born 26 April 1959) is an Irish politician, who served as Minister for Environment in the Northern Ireland Executive. He is a member of the Social Democratic and Labour Party and represents Belfast West in the Northern Ireland Assembly, and is currently active on Twitter.

full.extract: Alex Attwood MLA (born 26 April 1959) is an Irish politician, who served as Minister for Environment in the Northern Ireland Executive. He is a member of the Social Democratic and Labour Party and represents Belfast West in the Northern Ireland Assembly, and is currently active on Twitter.
full.title: Alex Attwood
